name: Bus Driver Parking Zigzag Road
description:
Bus Driver Parking Zigzag Road

Winter is on its peak, snow is falling every time. It’s getting cold and colder. City road are covered with lairs of snow.
Grab the steer wheels, control breaks and race perfectly. Roads are slippery and snowy; bus can easily slide down to river or lower mountains.
Bus winter parking – 3D game is a real parking game full of different parking challenges.
Drive heavy metro bus in modern city and hilly off roads as well. People are out to have fun and hang out.
Basically this game is set in a winter scene, drive through this winter wonderland is super fun. But the game still remains a real parking
game.

key features:

Amazing 3D graphics and sounds
Real snowfall simulated driving
Smooth controls, Acceleration and braking
A lot of different types buses
